Z-DocsPremium Scripts & Documentation.

We build high-quality FiveM scripts for your server. Z-DOCS is the central hub for all our resource documentation, including our powerful Z-Core bridge and real-time Z-Admin dashboard.

Z-Core

The intelligent bridge for your server. It automatically detects your framework and provides the foundation for all your admin tools to work seamlessly.

Universal Compatibility

Whether you use ESX, QBCore, or ox_core â€” Z-Core adapts automatically. You don't need to change anything about your existing setup.

Effortless Installation

Download the folder, start it in your server configuration, and it just works. No complicated setups.

Access Control

Decide exactly which team members can access certain features. Secure, reliable, and easy to manage.

Z-Admin

Your command center. A beautiful, real-time dashboard to manage players, view your map, handle support tickets, and keep your community safe.

Player Management

Kick, ban, heal, or teleport players instantly. Check their inventories and manage their vehicles with one click.

Interactive Live Map

See exactly where every player is on the map in real-time. Click to inspect, spectate, or teleport immediately.

Security & Audit Logs

Protect your server automatically. The system monitors for suspicious activity, blocked exploits, and logs every important action your admins take.

Support Tickets

Players can ask for help directly in-game. Your team receives the tickets on the dashboard and can reply or resolve them quickly.

Beautiful Design

Choose from multiple curated color themes to make the dashboard match your server's unique brand perfectly.
